summary: A well-to-do, shut-in thirty-something faces city life, family secrets and his own quirks when he is finally thrown out by his parents.
cast: Alex van Warmerdam|Henri Garcin|Olga Zuiderhoek|Annet Malherbe|Loes Luca|Arend Jan Heerma van Voss|Anton Kothuis|Peer Mascini|Elmar Schiphorst|Marc van Warmerdam|Jan-Willem Hees|Jeroen Henneman|Mieke Verdin|Josse De Pauw|Otakar Votocek|Aat Ceelen|Dorien de Jonge|Rien Bogaart|Paul Hoehner|Vedette van de Harginahof|Chris Bolczek|Jan Griese|Henk Pama|Rene Sauer|Ton Scheepmaker|Huib Stam|Kees Stolker|Joke van den Berg|Thijs van der Poll|Jan van Eeten|Wim Veenendaal|Gerard Vosse|Hennie Zwanenburg
title: Los secretos de Abel
